original_text: I continued to pray and tell God about our sins. I agreed that I had done wrong things, and that my people, the Israelites, had also done wrong things. I asked the Lord my God to help Jerusalem, his holy mountain.
korean_text: 내가 이같이 말하여 기도하며 내 죄와 내 백성 이스라엘의 죄를 자복하고 내 하나님의 거룩한 산을 위하여 내 하나님 여호와 앞에 간구할 때

sentences.original_text: and tell God about our sins
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리의 죄에 대해 하나님께 말씀드렸습니다

sentences.original_text: I agreed that I had done wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내가 잘못된 일들을 했다는 것을 인정했습니다

sentences.original_text: and that my people, the Israelites, had also done wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내 백성인 이스라엘 사람들도 잘못된 일들을 했다는 것을 인정했습니다

sentences.original_text: I asked the Lord my God
to help Jerusalem, his holy mountain
